H0.text: Sand is the type of soil content that best benefits plants needing an environment where water drains easily.

H1.text: Shale is the type of soil content that best benefits plants that need an environment where water drains easily.

H2.text: Clay is the type of soil content that best benefits plants that require an environment where water drains easily.

H3.text: Silt is the type of soil content that best benefits plants that need an environment where water drains easily.

A4.text: sandy soils contain large pore spaces that allow leaching.
